thread.title: Emmerdale

author: Fiona Flynn
title: Emmerdale
text: Chas is convinced that Robert's shooter is still out there and is now targeting her, while Cain visits Aaron at the remand centre and is shocked to see that he's a broken man. Later at The Woolpack, Diane suggests that Chas smashed up the bar herself as a smokescreen for Aaron. Cain arrives shortly afterwards and Chas starts to break down when she hears that Aaron has been charged. Cain feels the pressure to save his family, but how? Meanwhile, Lawrence tries to make amends with Bernice, but it seems she is still holding a candle for Andy. Let it go, for the love of God woman.
